andromeda.why: Focusing on small tasks is inner regulation, not liberation/rescue.

arcturus.why: Sets a clean attention container and workable cadence—detail-first stabilization.

draco.why: Early anxiety can flip into correctness policing of details.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing rigid rules to ‘control’ concentration—micromanagement tilt.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal of discipline: hold focus despite noise and uncertainty.

pleiades.why: Gentle self-soothing supports staying with the small.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching focus; no method transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Protecting attention from interference ≠ anti-domination mission.

arcturus.why: Functional pacing and boundaries keep the focus container coherent.

draco.why: Gatekeeping around the ‘right’ way to focus can surface.

orion-dark.why: Procedural rigidity to force productivity when threatened.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint: wait and act only when timing and focus align.

sirius.why: Process stewardship without explicit teaching/codification yet.

andromeda.why: Struggle with scattered focus is personal regulation, not rescue.

arcturus.why: Choppy regulation: pattern breaks and anxious timing tweaks.

draco.why: Defensiveness can turn into rank/‘my method’ posturing.

orion-dark.why: Forcing routines to control anxiety; compliance over clarity.

orion-light.why: Trial-by-frustration: cultivate patience and discipline until focus holds.

andromeda.why: Stabilizing focus into a system ≠ chain-breaking action.

draco.why: Success can attract status gating over who edits the method.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine-lock risk: mistaking process for law.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-steadiness: others face the ordeal of aligning to method.

pleiades.why: Relational pacing helps the team adopt the method.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-method: teaching focus through the protocol itself.

andromeda.why: Being recognized for reliability is stewardship, not liberation work.

arcturus.why: Dependable cadence others can organize around—container excellence.

draco.why: Authority aura can slip into ‘right way’ policing.

orion-dark.why: Projection into authority can harden into compliance enforcement.

orion-light.why: Leadership-by-discipline in the open—focus under visibility.

pleiades.why: Timing care so receivers aren’t overwhelmed.

sirius.why: Focus mentor: demonstrates the law of attention as living instruction.

andromeda.why: Long-view concentration isn’t a direct rescue vector.

arcturus.why: Elder mastery of pacing and detail stabilizes systems across cycles.

draco.why: Status-preserving rigidity can creep in around legacy methods.

orion-dark.why: Turning focus into dogma/hierarchy rather than living practice.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: humility and discipline to serve the work, not the ego.

pleiades.why: Focus is system integrity, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Concentration sage—teaches attention as a law through embodied example.
